entry.lex: The 1 Decembrie 1918 University is located in Alba lulia, Alba. Its Latin name is "Universitas Apulensis" and its nickname is "Uab".
1 दिसंबर 1918 विश्वविद्यालय अल्बा लूलिया, अल्बा में स्थित है। "इसका लैटिन नाम" "Universitas Apulensis" "है और इसका उपनाम" "Uab" "है।"
The 1 Decembrie 1918 University's latin name is "Universitas Apulensis". It's nickname is Uab and is located in Alba lulia, Alba.
1 दिसम्बर 1918 को विश्वविद्यालय का लैटिन नाम था Universitas Apulensis। इसका उपनाम उआब है और यह अल्बा लूलिया, अल्बा में स्थित है।
The 1 Decembrie 1918 University (of the city of Alba Iulia in the state of Alba), has the nickname Uab and the Latin name Universitas Apulensis.
1 दिसंबर 1918 को विश्वविद्यालय (अल्बा राज्य में अल्बा लूलिया शहर का), उपनाम उआब और लैटिन नाम यूनिवर्सिटास अपुलेंसिस है।
Breaz Valer Daniel is rector of the 1 Decembrie 1918 University, which has the nickname of Uab, and is located in the city of Alba Iulia, Romania.
ब्रेज़ वैलर डैनियल 1 दिसंबर 1918 विश्वविद्यालय के रेक्टर हैं, जिसे उआब का उपनाम दिया गया है और यह रोमानिया के अल्बा यूलिया शहर में स्थित है।
The 1 Decembrie 1918 University, also known as Uab, is located in Alba Iulia, Romania. It's rector is Breaz Valer Daniel.

The 1 Decembrie 1918 University of Alba Iulia, Romania has the nickname Uab and the rector is called Breaz Valer Daniel.

The rector of the 1 Decembrie 1918 University in the state of Alba, Romania is Breaz Valer Daniel. The latin name of the university is "Universitas Apulensis".
रोमानिया के अल्बा राज्य में 1 दिसंबर 1918 विश्वविद्यालय के रेक्टर ब्रेज़ वैलर डैनियल हैं। "विश्वविद्यालय का लैटिन नाम" "यूनिवर्सिटीज अपुलेंसिस" "है।"
The Decembrie 1918 University in Alba Romania has the latin name of Universitas Apulensis. It's rector is Breaz Valer Daniel.

The AWH Engineering College is located in Kuttikkattoor, Kerala and it has 250 academic staff. Kerala has Mahe, India to its northwest.

The Accademia di Architettura di Mendrisio has an academic staff of 100 and is located in the country of Switzerland, whose leader is Johann Schneider-Ammann. His title is Federal Chancellor of Switzerland.
